bibl.title: List of photographs taken at the dedication of Monumento Nacional Campamento Lazear, December 3, 1952

div1.p: Hench lists photographs taken during the dedication ceremonies of Camp Lazear, including scenes of speeches, laying of wreaths, and presentation of awards.

div1.head: List of photographs taken at the dedication of Monumento Nacional Campamento Lazear, December 3, 1952
div1.p: (*Films in my possession at present; other films will be sent to me on loan soon(?)

p.hi:
Dedication of “Monumento Nacional Campamento Lazear”
